title: Will Verstappen leave next? Horner exit doesn't settle Red Bull fear
summary: Red Bull may have sacked Christian Horner partly to try and keep Max Verstappen but, writesChris Medland, it will take much more to turn the F1 team around

qa_pairs.question: Who is the team principal of Red Bull Racing?
What is the primary concern surrounding Max Verstappen's future with Red Bull Racing?
Which driver is currently associated with Red Bull Racing and is a two-time World Champion?
